channel.desc: CBC's flagship nightly news program, featuring the day's top stories with in-depth and original journalism; Adrienne Arsenault and Ian Hanomansing anchor.

channel.desc: Developing stories in the Greater Toronto regions, weeknights, Monday to Friday.

channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: Perched on the most westerly edge of Canada and despite its incredible beauty, Ucluelet is having to work hard to attract tourists from its well-known neighbor, Tofino.

channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: David seeks Lily's version of events, and Debbie refuses to concede defeat.

channel.desc: Crabtree and Effie's celebration of Charles Dickens' birthday is upended when the host winds up mysteriously dead.

channel.desc: When an archaeologist winds up dead in her dig site, Arch and Fitz look into a group of academics to find the murderer.

channel.desc: Mary's job is threatened when she accuses Detective Greyson of hiding evidence.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: This Hour Has 22 Minutes
channel.desc: Looking at how the government is steering people through the second wave of the coronavirus; coverage from Washington D.C. ahead of the U.S. election.
